author: Okogba
title: Frot Group congratulates Pinnick

organizations.name: confederation of african football executive committee

text:
Home » Sports » Frot Group congratulates Pinnick Frot Group congratulates Pinnick 4:26 am In Sports by Okogba Comments 
P resident FROT Group Frank Momoh has congratulated the Nigeria Football Federation president Amaju Pinnick on his recent election as a member of the Confederation of African Football Executive Committee. Pinnick 
Momoh described Pinnick’s election as “the right step in the right direction for Nigerian football”, saying the country stood to gain a lot now that a Nigerian was in CAF’s executive committee. 
Momoh said, “Pinnick’s election is a milestone achievement for Nigerian football and I believe he will bring his wealth of experience to bear on Nigerian and African football. “Bearing in mind that the country has not been in the forefront of football politics in Africa for sometime now, Pinnick’s election will further position the country for better things to come in football.”
